page.title: 02Coddenham Area Medical Care
page.content: Coddenham village and the area of our block is mainly served by a group practice based at the nearby small town of Needham Market. There is a doctor on duty in Coddenham 1 morning a week and surgery takes place in two rooms in the Country Club. Facilities in the waiting room and surgery are minimal but the waiting room is a prime place to catch up on local gossip. Repeat prescriptions must be placed in a box located outside the surgery on a specific day each week. They are then collected and taken to the dispensary at the practice head- quarters. The medicines are then delivered to Coddenham Post Office to await collection. Further health care is provided by Stowmarket Health Centre, 8 miles away, which sends out Health Visitors and Nurses. Nearest General Hospital is Ipswich, 6 miles.
